entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
